text: Happen to be around the area and was surprise to know that this awaiting pcn was finally open. Good walking distance of 2.8km to and fro.

Finally opened ðŸ˜ŠIt is about 1.43km from the  map board till the dead end, where you will need to turn around to get back out. It run along the perimeter of the seletar club and itâ€™s very quiet with little human traffic. You see the club on 1 side and the reservoir on the other side. Nothing much to see, till 1 day they tidy up the shore side and people can really enjoy the reservoir view. The park board should tidy up the place abit!
First time discovered Seletar Park connector, saw fat fat otters having their dinner!

Visited on rainy days.
Awesome view
Could view propeller planes flying

Nice, quiet place. Re-opened recentlyâ€¦ and extended. PCN end while Seletar Country Club ends, got to U turn. Saw a very large monitor lizard drying itself during weekday morningâ€¦. be alert if you are here weekday mornings! Look forward to it extending further to the whole of the reservoir soon!
